data.title: GoldenSource ESG Impact
data.meta_description: With the vision, design, and user experience of GoldenSource ESG Impact, you’ll get more value, faster from your ESG initiatives.
data.text:
Higher returns, more customers, and regulatory comfort

Getting the best ESG outcomes requires fundamental data management capabilities, including expertise in taking data feeds in from an array of vendors, normalizing, standardizing and mastering that data, tagging it for various regulations and taxonomies, sending it to business, reporting and analytics systems, linking it other enterprise data domains, such as entities and securities, and running optimal data workflows to support use cases across the business.

These are the core competencies of GoldenSource – and with operationalization of ESG data underpinning the vision, design, and user experience of GoldenSource ESG Impact, you’ll get more value, faster from your ESG initiatives.

Benefits of GoldenSource

Centralizing ESG data, transforming it to make it easily consumable across the organization, ensures that:

Investment teams can drive the investment decision making process

Product teams have insights to drive innovation

Regulatory and compliance departments can meet all upcoming disclosure and reporting requirements

Relevant data from the growing number of providers can easily be operationalised

Emerging requirements around anti-greenwashing and sustainability can be addressed through configuration rather than coding

GoldenSource ESG Impact: the ESG advantage
